items.title: Oppo Find X9 hands-on
items.summary: Oppo took the wraps off its Find X9 series today and we managed to get hold of a Find X9 unit after the event. While we did not get to perform our usual set of tests and benchmarks just yet, we did get to use the device for a short period of time, and these are our first impressions. Find X9 feels â€¦

items.title: Here's the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra inside another case
items.summary: Samsung's upcoming Galaxy S26 Ultra was showcased in some CAD-based renders late last month, then we saw it in a very iPhone-esque colorway last week, and now it's time to take yet another look at it, this time inside a case. Another case, to be specific, as we've already seen it in some other caseâ€¦

items.title: 'Dark days behind us' - Pickford signs new Everton deal
items.summary: England goalkeeper Jordan Pickford signs a new contract at Everton that will keep him at the club until the summer of 2029.

items.title: Draper & coach Trotman part ways after four years
items.summary: Jack Draper will no longer work with the man who coached him to the Indian Wells title as James Trotman wants to prioritise time with his family.

items.title: Muscat close to deal to become Rangers head coach
items.summary: Rangers are close to agreeing a deal to secure Shanghai Port's Kevin Muscat as their new head coach, but personal terms and other issues have still to be finalised.

items.title: Muscat close to deal to become Rangers head coach
items.summary: Rangers are close to agreeing a deal to secure Shanghai Port's Kevin Muscat as their new head coach, but personal terms and other issues have still to be finalised.

items.title: Clarke v TKV on BBC moved to November after injury
items.summary: The British heavyweight title fight between Frazer Clarke and Jeamie TKV has been moved to 29 November after TKV suffered an injury.

items.title: LeBron, Ronaldo, Brady 'inspire' Djokovic to play into 40s
items.summary: Novak Djokovic wants to follow sporting greats such as LeBron James, Cristiano Ronaldo and Tom Brady by playing in his 40s and help shape the future of tennis.

items.title: Ex-UFC stars Silva & Weidman to box at Paul event
items.summary: Ex-UFC fighters Anderson Silva and Chris Weidman will take their UFC rivarly into boxing on the undercard of Jake Paul v Gervonta Davis.

items.title: US GP second F1 race in row to be 'heat hazard'
items.summary: The United States Grand Prix in Austin is the second race in succession to be declared a "heat hazard" under F1's rules.

items.title: RedMagic 11 Pro gets unboxed underwater, battery capacity and charging specs outed

Ahead of that, the brand has published a video underwater unboxing of the 11 Pro, for some reason. See it embedded beloâ€¦

items.title: Real's Alexander-Arnold has chance of facing Liverpool
items.summary: Trent Alexander-Arnold's rehab is going according to plan and there is a chance the Real Madrid right-back will be fit to face his old club Liverpool in November's Champions League tie.

items.title: China's latest round of rare-earth export controls gives the country dominion over precious resources â€” regulations have far-reaching implications for the semiconductor industry
items.summary: China has expanded its rare-earth export controls to cover not only raw materials but also to mining equipment, and foreign-made products containing Chinese-origin rare earths, effectively globalizing its licensing regime.

items.title: Two Nvidia DGX Spark systems fused with M3 Ultra Mac Studio to deliver 2.8x gain in AI benchmarks â€” EXO Labs demonstrates disaggregated AI inference serving
items.summary: Using its EXO software, the company was able to split an AI inference workload and run it on three systems simultaneously.

items.title: OxygenOS 16 hands-on review
items.summary: OxygenOS 16 is the latest major OS release from OnePlus. Built on top of the new Android 16 base operating system, OxygenOS 16 is an evolution of the ideas introduced with OxygenOS 15, including parallel processing for UI animations, new AI functionality, and improved interconnectivity with other pâ€¦

items.title: PC gaming smashes consoles in Battlefield 6 sales, report claims â€” blockbuster shooter sells 7m units, generating an estimated $350 million in revenue
items.summary: Battlefield's triumphant return to form has been met with an equally impressive launch record, with the latest title in the series moving over 7 million copies at its launch, across PC and console. EA has reportedly generated $350M+ in revenue, with 56.7% of that coming from PC, followed by PlayStaâ€¦

items.title: TSMC posts record quarter results as skyrocketing AI and HPC demand drives two-thirds of revenue â€” company pulls in $33.1 billion
items.summary: TSMC posted a record $33.1 billion in quarterly revenue driven by surging demand for AI and HPC processors, the ramp of Apple's latest SoCs, and the continued strength of advanced nodes.

items.summary: PayPalâ€™s crypto partner, Paxos, accidentally minted $300 trillion PYUSD on Wednesday. Firm admits 'internal technical error.'

items.summary: Oppo's Find X9 series will debut globally on October 28 in Barcelona, Spain, but we have already gotten our hands on the Find X9 Pro and can share some early impressions with you.
